notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All authors contributed to the design of the study, C.A.B. and F.M. carried out the field and laboratory experiments. C.B.W. and M.A. analyzed oceanographic data and developed indices. J.M.B. provided the methodology for physiology analysis. S.G.M., C.B.W. and M.A. provided guidance and logistical support on oceanography. A.E.M. and J.C.B. provided the experimental animals, laboratory space and advice in husbandry. L.V.V. provided input in experimental design and manuscript preparation. C.A.B., F.M. and C.B.W. wrote the manuscript, with input from all authors.
